cve-descriptions-2024.name: cve-descriptions-2024
cve-descriptions-2024.description: Curated collection of CVE descriptions from 2024 for vulnerability analysis training. Contains 15,000 entries with structured vulnerability information.
cve-descriptions-2024.safety_notes: Reviewed for harmful exploit code. Contains only descriptions and metadata, no working exploit code.

threat-intel-reports.name: threat-intel-reports
threat-intel-reports.description: Anonymized threat intelligence reports from security vendors. Suitable for training models on threat analysis and incident response.
threat-intel-reports.safety_notes: All IOCs have been defanged. No active malware samples or working C2 addresses included.

security-qa-pairs.name: security-qa-pairs
security-qa-pairs.description: Question-answer pairs covering cybersecurity topics including network security, cryptography, and secure coding practices.
security-qa-pairs.safety_notes: Educational content only. Answers focus on defensive techniques and do not provide attack instructions.

pentest-methodology-docs.name: pentest-methodology-docs
pentest-methodology-docs.description: Documentation excerpts describing penetration testing methodologies and frameworks.
pentest-methodology-docs.safety_notes: Pending review. Contains methodology descriptions that may include offensive techniques.
